:::config { "language": "php", "theme": "moonlight" }
class LogoutResponse implements \Laravel\Fortify\Contracts\LogoutResponse
{
    public function toResponse($request)
    {
        return $request->wantsJson()
            ? new JsonResponse('', 204)
            : redirect('/');
    }
}
:::expectation
<pre><code data-theme='moonlight' data-lang='php' class='phiki language-php moonlight torchlight' style='background-color: #212337;color: #aab3e5;--theme-selection-background: #aab3e5'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #5b6395; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #baacff;">class</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #ffdb8e;">LogoutResponse</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #baacff;">implements</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #7fdaff;">\</span><span class="token" style="color: #ffdb8e;">Laravel</span><span class="token" style="color: #7fdaff;">\</span><span class="token" style="color: #ffdb8e;">Fortify</span><span class="token" style="color: #7fdaff;">\</span><span class="token" style="color: #ffdb8e;">Contracts</span><span class="token" style="color: #7fdaff;">\</span><span class="token" style="color: #7af8ca;">LogoutResponse</span><span class="token">
